entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
